edge_1: Docter said Jamie Foxx (himself a classically trained pianist) was perfect for Joe, citing his comedic skills and musical background.
edge_2: Initial storyboards featured several brief scenes showing 22's life on Earth after her new birth, including one of her reuniting with Joe in New York.
edge_3: To animate New York, the filmmakers explored jazz clubs and pizza stops for inspiration.
